p: All data used in this paper are public and available at specific repositories. In particular, solar UV data are made available by the Tropospheric Emission Monitoring Internet Service (TEMIS) archive and are available at http://www.temis.nl; the Italian data of the SARS-CoV-2 epidemics are distributed by the Italian National Institute of Health, made available by the Coronavirus Resource Center of the John Hopkins University (CRC-JHUL) and downloadable from the GitHub repository https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19.
